Identity (0.1.0)

Discussions thread

Manage issuance of digital credential

ID-VRFY : /identity/verify

Verification of person's demographics against foundational id

Authorizations:
x-access-token
Request Body schema:
signature
string (MsgSignature)

Signature of {header}+{message} body verified using sender's signing public key

required
object

Message header

required
object

Responses

Sandbox Server

https://sandbox.dpg.org/v0.1.0/identity/verify

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
{
  • "signature": "Signature: namespace=\"g2p\", kidId=\"{sender_id}|{unique_key_id}|{algorithm}\", algorithm=\"ed25519\", created=\"1606970629\", expires=\"1607030629\", headers=\"(created) (expires) digest\", signature=\"Base64(signing content)",
  • "header": {
    • "version": "0.1.0",
    • "message_id": "123456789020211216223812",
    • "message_ts": "2022-12-04T18:01:07+00:00",
    • "action": "issue",
    • "sender_id": "10089",
    • "sender_uri": "https://pymts.sender.org/g2p/callback/on-disburse",
    • "receiver_id": "52077",
    • "total_count": 21800
    },
  • "message": {
    • "transaction_id": 12345678901234567000,
    • "verify_request": [
      • {
        • "reference_id": "12345678901234567890",
        • "timestamp": "2022-12-04T17:20:07-04:00",
        • "id": "12345@token.mosip",
        • "consent_obtained": "y",
        • "demographics": {
          • "mobile_number": "string",
          • "alt_mobile_number": "string",
          • "phone": "string",
          • "email_id": "string",
          • "alt_email_id": "string",
          • "attributes": [
            • {
              • "seq_num": 1,
              • "attribute_name": "string",
              • "operator": "eq",
              • "attribute_value": "string"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "attributes": [
          • {
            • "seq_num": 1,
            • "attribute_name": "string",
            • "operator": "eq",
            • "attribute_value": "string"
            }
          ],
        • "locale": "en"
        }
      ]
    }
}

Response samples

  • 401
  • 403
  • 500
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "error": {
    • "code": "string",
    • "message": "string"
    }
}

ID-ON-VRFY : /idenity/on-issue

Verification response through callback

Authorizations:
x-access-token
Request Body schema:
signature
string (MsgSignature)

Signature of {header}+{message} body verified using sender's signing public key

required
object

Message header

object

Responses

Sandbox Server

https://sandbox.dpg.org/v0.1.0/credential/on-issue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
{
  • "signature": "Signature: namespace=\"g2p\", kidId=\"{sender_id}|{unique_key_id}|{algorithm}\", algorithm=\"ed25519\", created=\"1606970629\", expires=\"1607030629\", headers=\"(created) (expires) digest\", signature=\"Base64(signing content)",
  • "header": {
    • "version": "0.1.0",
    • "message_id": "123456789020211216223812",
    • "message_ts": "2022-12-04T18:02:35+00:00",
    • "action": "on-issue",
    • "status": "rcvd",
    • "status_reason_code": "rjct.version.invalid",
    • "status_reason_message": "string",
    • "total_count": 21800,
    • "completed_count": 50,
    • "sender_id": "10089",
    • "sender_uri": "",
    • "receiver_id": "52077",
    • "receiver_uri": ""
    },
  • "message": {
    • "transaction_id": 12345678901234567000,
    • "verify_response": [
      • {
        • "reference_id": "12345678901234567890",
        • "timestamp": "2022-12-04T17:20:07-04:00",
        • "status": "rcvd",
        • "status_reason_code": "rjct.reference_id.invalid",
        • "status_reason_message": "string",
        • "token": "string",
        • "results": [
          • {
            • "seq_num": 1,
            • "result": "y"
            }
          ],
        • "locale": "en"
        }
      ]
    }
}

Response samples

  • 401
  • 403
  • 500
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "error": {
    • "code": "string",
    • "message": "string"
    }
}

ID-TXNSTS : /identity/txn/status

Perform async status check of previous identity transanctions using transaction_id and/or reference_id(s)

Authorizations:
x-access-token
Request Body schema:
signature
string (MsgSignature)

Signature of {header}+{message} body verified using sender's signing public key

required
object

Message header

required
object

Responses

Sandbox Server

https://sandbox.dpg.org/v0.1.0/credential/txn/status

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
{
  • "signature": "Signature: namespace=\"g2p\", kidId=\"{sender_id}|{unique_key_id}|{algorithm}\", algorithm=\"ed25519\", created=\"1606970629\", expires=\"1607030629\", headers=\"(created) (expires) digest\", signature=\"Base64(signing content)",
  • "header": {
    • "version": "0.1.0",
    • "message_id": "123456789020211216223812",
    • "message_ts": "2022-12-04T18:01:07+00:00",
    • "action": "issue",
    • "sender_id": "10089",
    • "sender_uri": "https://pymts.sender.org/g2p/callback/on-disburse",
    • "receiver_id": "52077",
    • "total_count": 21800
    },
  • "message": {
    • "transaction_id": 12345678901234567000,
    • "txnstatus_request": {
      • "reference_id": "12345678901234567890",
      • "search_type": "transaction_id",
      • "search_attribute": 12345678901234567000,
      • "locale": "en"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 401
  • 403
  • 500
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "error": {
    • "code": "string",
    • "message": "string"
    }
}

ID-ON-TXNSTS : /identity/txn/on-status

Response to async status check of previous identity transanctions using callback

Authorizations:
x-access-token
Request Body schema:
signature
string (MsgSignature)

Signature of {header}+{message} body verified using sender's signing public key

required
object

Message header

object

Responses

Sandbox Server

https://sandbox.dpg.org/v0.1.0/identity/txn/on-status

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
{
  • "signature": "Signature: namespace=\"g2p\", kidId=\"{sender_id}|{unique_key_id}|{algorithm}\", algorithm=\"ed25519\", created=\"1606970629\", expires=\"1607030629\", headers=\"(created) (expires) digest\", signature=\"Base64(signing content)",
  • "header": {
    • "version": "0.1.0",
    • "message_id": "123456789020211216223812",
    • "message_ts": "2022-12-04T18:02:35+00:00",
    • "action": "on-issue",
    • "status": "rcvd",
    • "status_reason_code": "rjct.version.invalid",
    • "status_reason_message": "string",
    • "total_count": 21800,
    • "completed_count": 50,
    • "sender_id": "10089",
    • "sender_uri": "",
    • "receiver_id": "52077",
    • "receiver_uri": ""
    },
  • "message": {
    • "transaction_id": 12345678901234567000,
    • "txnstatus_response": {
      • "on-txnstatus-response": {
        • "reference_id": "test",
        • "timestamp": "test",
        • "status": "SUCC"
        }
      }
    }
}
